properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SSH.STDSTATCD AS STDSTATCD , SSH.STDNO AS STUDENT_NO , SSH.CCYRCD AS FROMCCYRCD , SSH.SEMCD AS FROMSEMCD , CODE.L_ABR_CODE , D.DEGRESTSEMGRD AS DGR_GRAD_ESTIMATE_SEM_COUNT , D.DEGRMAXSEMGRD AS DGR_GRAD_MAXIMUM_SEM_COUNT , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) AS CURRENT_YEAR FROM STD_STATUS_HISTORY SSH , SIS_CODES CODE , STD_DEGREE SD , DEGREE D WHERE SSH.STDNO=:paramStdNo AND ( SSH.STDSTATCD = :paramStdStatCode OR SSH.STDSTATCD IS NULL ) AND SSH.STATUSCD = CODE.SISCODECD AND SSH.STDSTATCD = SD.STDSTATCD AND SD.DEGRCD = D.DEGRCD AND CODE.L_ABR_CODE IN ('PST','REG') ORDER BY SSH.UPDDTE, SSH.CCYRCD, SSH.SEMCD ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT COUNT(L_ABR_CRSNO) FROM (
SELECT SCHED.STDNO , SECT.L_ABR_CRSNO , SECT.CCYRCD , SECT.SEMCD FROM SCHED_STD SCHED , SECT SECT WHERE SCHED.SECTCD = SECT.SECTCD AND STDNO = :paramStdNo AND (SECT.CCYRCD >= :paramFromCourseYear AND SECT.CCYRCD <= :paramCurrentYear ) AND NOT (SECT.CCYRCD = :paramFromCourseYear AND SECT.SEMCD < :paramFromSemester)
ORDER BY SECT.CCYRCD, SECT.SEMCD ) WHERE L_ABR_CRSNO LIKE 'LANC%'
SELECT COUNT(STDNO) AS COUNT_REC FROM STD_POSTPONE WHERE STDNO = :paramStdNo AND STDSTATCD = :paramStdStatCode
SELECT CCYRCD AS CURRENT_YEAR , SEMCD AS SEMCD FROM CURRENT_YR_SEM

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_REC FROM V_CURRENT_YRSEM_PORTAL VCYP WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) > ( DECODE( UPPER(SUBSTR(l_abr_yrsem,3,4)) , 'SU',(TRUNC(VCYP.SEMSTDTE) + (TRUNC(VCYP.SEMENDDTE) - TRUNC(VCYP.SEMSTDTE))) ,TRUNC(VCYP.SEMSTDTE +:paramNumberDays) ) )
SELECT CCYRCD AS CCYRCD , SEMCD AS SEMCD FROM V_YR_SEM_CURRENT
SELECT CCYRCD AS CCYRCD , SEMCD AS SEMCD FROM V_YR_SEM_LAST
SELECT CCYRCD AS CCYRCD , SEMCD AS SEMCD FROM ( SELECT * FROM YR_SEM YRSEM WHERE TRUNC(YRSEM.SEMSTDTE+:paramNumberDays) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY YRSEM.SEMSTDTE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT NVL( ( SELECT STDTHESISCD FROM STD_THESIS T1 WHERE T1.STDNO = :paramStdNo AND T1.STDSTATCD = :paramStdStatCode ) , 0 ) AS STDTHESISCD FROM DUAL

SELECT COUNT(STDNO) AS COUNT_REC FROM THESIS_DISCUSSION TH , SIS_CODES CODES WHERE STDNO = :paramStdNo AND TH.DISC_TYPE = CODES.SISCODECD AND CODES.L_ABR_CODE = :paramSeminarAbrCode AND STDTHESISCD = :paramThesisCode AND ( STATUS IS NULL OR STATUS = ( SELECT CODE.SISCODECD FROM SIS_CODES CODE , SIS_CODE_TYPES TYPS WHERE CODE.L_ABR_CODE = 'COMP' AND CODE.SISCODETYPCD = TYPS.SISCODETYPCD AND TYPS.SISCODETYPNM = 'THESIS_DISC_TYPE_STATUS' ) )
SELECT NVL(COUNT_REC,0) AS COUNT_REC FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT_REC FROM V_CURRENT_YRSEM_PORTAL WHERE SYSDATE >= SEMSTDTE+((:param_week-1)*7) )
SELECT NVL(COUNT_REC,0) AS COUNT_REC FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT_REC FROM V_YR_SEM_LAST WHERE SYSDATE >= SEMSTDTE+((:param_week-1)*7) )

SELECT COUNT(EXTN.STDNO) AS COUNT_REC FROM STD_EXTENSION EXTN , SIS_CODES CODES , SIS_CODE_TYPES TYPS WHERE EXTN.EXTREQ_STATUSCD = CODES.SISCODECD AND CODES.SISCODETYPCD = TYPS.SISCODETYPCD AND CODES.L_ABR_CODE IN ('ACCPT','PENDG','PRGRS','MODFY') AND TYPS.SISCODETYPNM = 'APPROVAL_STATUS' AND EXTN.STDNO = :paramStdNo AND EXTN.STDSTATCD = :paramStdStatCode

SELECT DECODE ( COUNT(WITHIN_DATE) , 0 , 'N','Y' ) AS WITHDRAW_DATE FROM ( SELECT 'Y' AS WITHIN_DATE FROM V_STD_CURREG REG WHERE REG.STDNO = :paramStdNo AND REG.STDSTATCD = :paramStdStatCode AND SYSDATE BETWEEN REG.FIRSTWTHDTE AND REG.SECONDWTHDTE )

SELECT DECODE ( COUNT(EXT.STDNO) , 0, 'N' , 'Y' ) AS SEM_EXTENDED FROM STD_EXTENSION EXT , SIS_CODES CODES WHERE EXT.EXTREQ_STATUSCD = CODES.SISCODECD AND EXT.STDSTATCD = :paramStdStatCode AND EXT.FROMCCYRCD = :paramCCYrCode AND EXT.FROMSEMCD = :paramSemCode AND CODES.L_ABR_CODE = 'ACCPT'

SELECT DECODE ( COUNT(PST.STDNO) , 0, 'N' , 'Y' ) AS SEM_POSTPONED
FROM STD_POSTPONE PST , SIS_CODES CODES WHERE PST.POSTREQ_STATUSCD = CODES.SISCODECD AND PST.STDSTATCD = :paramStdStatCode AND PST.FROMCCYRCD = (SELECT CCYRCD FROM CURRENT_YR_SEM) AND PST.FROMSEMCD = (SELECT SEMCD FROM CURRENT_YR_SEM) AND CODES.L_ABR_CODE = 'ACCPT'

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(REG.FIRSTWTHDTE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH:MM') AS FIRST_WITHDRAW_DATE , TO_CHAR(REG.SECONDWTHDTE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH:MM') AS SECOND_WITHDRAW_DATE FROM V_STD_CURREG REG WHERE REG.STDSTATCD = :paramStdStatCode AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DECODE ( CNT , 0, 'N','Y' ) AS IS_THESIS_COURSE FROM ( SELECT count(*) AS CNT FROM SCHED_STD SCH_STD , V_CRS_TYP VCT WHERE SCH_STD.CRSTYPCD = VCT.CRSTYPCD AND SCH_STD.STDNO=:paramStdNo AND SCH_STD.CRSNO=:paramCourseNo AND VCT.L_ABR_CRSTYP='THESI' )

SELECT DECODE ( CNT , 0, 'N','Y' ) AS IS_THESIS_COURSE FROM ( SELECT count(*) AS CNT FROM SCHED_STD SCH_STD , V_CRS_TYP VCT WHERE SCH_STD.CRSTYPCD = VCT.CRSTYPCD AND SCH_STD.STDNO=:paramStdNo AND SCH_STD.CRSNO=:paramCourseNo AND VCT.L_ABR_CRSTYP='THESI' )
